title: Gameboy Emulator
description: Gameboy emulator written in C++, supporting early DMG games of cartridge type 'ROM Only'.

title: Junction Hackathon 2025
description: A platform for automatically creating optimized pumping schedules for wastewater pumping stations using a multi-agent system. Utilizes a digital twin, communicating using the OPC-UA protocol, for emulating station sensors, and an MCP server for providing the outputs to the mutli-agent system. The dashhboard helps visualize the station's current situation as well as provide insight into the optimization process. Received 2nd place in the HSY x Valmet challenge.

title: Playlist Downloader (CLI)
description: A simple CLI-tool that fetches the user's playlists and the song names in the selected playlist using the Spotify API.

title: KMC Palette Generator
description: Generates a color palette from an image using K-Means Clustering.

title: Junction Hackathon 2024
description: A tool to semi-automatically create 3D-models, building information models (BIM), out of 2D building floor plans. Uses React and Three.js for the front-end to construct, display and manipulate the BIMs, as well as Python and OpenCV for the back-end, to extract walls from the floor plan.

title: Junction Hackathon 2023
description: Dashboard tool with cards of varying information, from summarized news articles to graphed data and a chatbot. Utilized various LLMs and tools for managing and running these models, such as Ollama.ai.
